main_definition: Podcasts are digital audio or video files available for download from the internet, typically in episodic series format, that users can listen to or watch on various devices.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An episodic series of digital media
meanings_and_examples.example: She listens to true crime podcasts every evening.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A medium for content distribution and consumption over the internet
meanings_and_examples.example: Podcasts have become a popular way to share personal stories and ideas with a global audience.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Easy-to-create audio or video files that can be distributed online
meanings_and_examples.example: He started his own podcast about cooking, sharing recipes and culinary tips.
